name: Burger Rush (itch) (8dat, Bobby V. Klein)
description:
Run your own food truck and sell burgers to your ever-impatient customers in Burger Rush! Serve them their orders before they run out of patience or you'll be forced to shut your doors (or window) for good!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys - Move
  • E/Space - Action

Created in a week for Nokia 3310 Jam 5.

Programming - 8dat

Art - BobbyVKlein
